txt.en: A Tinker's greatest skill is that of jewelcraft, and a skilled Tinker can create baubles of both beauty and utility.  A Tinker can harvest the precious metals and stones he needs for his work, and given the long hours this trade requires, it is good that a Tinker is a fair hand at preparing a hearty meal.  Do you wish to learn this trade?  (JEWELLER, PROSPECTOR, COOK)
Fascinated by things intricate and beautiful, the Tinker seeks to create great things.

A Tinker's greatest skill is that of jewelcraft, and a skilled Tinker can create baubles of both beauty and utility.  A Tinker can harvest the precious metals and stones he needs for his work, and given the long hours this trade requires, it is good that a Tinker is a fair hand at preparing a hearty meal.  Do you wish to learn this trade?  (JEWELLER, PROSPECTOR, COOK)
